name: Flipping Houses
description:
Winter MelonJam 2022 submission by Max Huang and Hannah Ji.

Cozify the rooms by moving complementary items beside each other.

In this game, you flip houses — literally and figuratively. Use the flipping zones to move different objects to improve the house’s interior design. Flip until you match (i.e. move adjacent to each other) all of the cozy items in the room with their respective complimentary item.

Credits
  • The code was written by Max Huang and Hannah Ji.
  • The music was written by Max Huang.
  • The title screen background image was made by redgreystock on Freepik.
  • All other 2D images come from Flaticon.
  • All sound effects come from Mixkit.
